DOC.brief_summary: The main objectives of this study are to describe medical professionals responsible of the management of patients with MDD in a representative region of Andalusia (in terms of type of sites managing the disease, and referral to SC criteria); Describe MDD patient characteristics at inclusion in the PISMA-Ep Study; and to evaluate those factors associated to a higher incidence of referral from PC to SC.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of MDD Management in Andalusia
DOC.detailed_description: Assessment of MDD management strategies in Andalusia: A Sub-analysis of the PismaEP Study
DOC.criteria: MDD Diagnosis Participants of the PismaEP study 18 yo. or older No specific exclusion criteria
